DOC.brief_summary: Determine the safety and tolerability of the study drug, CPG 52364, when given as liquid or capsule. Another purpose is to determine how the drug enters and leaves the blood stream and body tissues over time.
DOC.brief_title: First Safety Study in Humans of a Single Dose of CPG 52364
DOC.criteria: Normal body mass index and weight No significant diseases in the medical history or clinically significant findings on physical exam, opthalmologic exam, clinical laboratory evaluations or 12lead electrocardiogram Current illness or history of medical condition affecting the body's function Use of any medication within 7 days, any immunosuppressive medication within 6 months, any investigational drug within 30 days or any vaccine or immunoglobulin within 90 days Use of any medications during the study Positive TB test Smoking within 6 months Pregnancy or risk of Pregnancy Alcohol or drug misuse within 60 days Sensitivity to quinazolines
DOC.keyword: treatment, parallel assignment, double blind, randomized, placebo control, safety study,SLE (Systemic Lupus Erythematosus)
